name: Indium(III) chloride
desc: Indium(III) chloride is the chemical compound with the formula InCl3. This colorless salt finds some use in organic synthesis as a Lewis acid. It is also the most available soluble derivative of indium.
Other anions:
Indium(III) fluoride
Indium(III) bromide
Indium(III) iodide
Other cations:
Aluminium chloride
Gallium trichloride
Thallium(III) chloride
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
